detailed_design.description: Add monitoring and observability infrastructure including health checks, metrics collection, and request tracing. Enable production monitoring and debugging.
detailed_design.solution: 1. Add health check endpoints. 2. Implement Prometheus metrics. 3. Add request tracing with correlation IDs. 4. Add performance monitoring. 5. Create monitoring dashboard.

user_stories.story: As a system administrator, I want health checks to monitor system status.
As a developer, I want metrics to identify performance bottlenecks.

technical_notes.current_issue: No monitoring, difficult to debug production issues
